Sentencas: SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-delta (SCN) has been investigated for oxygen transport membrane and solid oxide fuel cell applications as it is more stable than the state-of-the-art Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.8Fe0.2O3-delta (BSCF) material.
Titulo: Unraveling Crystal Structure and Transport Properties of Fast Ion Conducting SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: Here, the crystal structure and transport properties of SCN were systematically investigated.
Titulo: Unraveling Crystal Structure and Transport Properties of Fast Ion Conducting SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: Combined neutron and high-temperature X-ray powder diffraction analyses over the temperature range of 25-800 degrees C showed that the crystal structure of SCN belongs to the tetragonal space group P4/mmm with the unit cell a(c) x a(c) x 2a(c), where a(c) is the lattice parameter of the cubic perovskite at temperatures <160 degrees
Titulo: Unraveling Crystal Structure and Transport Properties of Fast Ion Conducting SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ
Unraveling Crystal Structure and Transport Properties of Fast Ion Conducting SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: The tetragonal (P4/mmm) to cubic (Pm<(3)over bar>m) phase transition occurred in SCN with increasing temperature.
Titulo: Unraveling Crystal Structure and Transport Properties of Fast Ion Conducting SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: This phase transition affected the electrical conductivity, whereas the impact on the magnetic susceptibility was not significant.
Titulo: Unraveling Crystal Structure and Transport Properties of Fast Ion Conducting SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: The surface exchange and diffusion coefficients of SCN in the temperature range of 600-850 degrees C were characterized by electrical conductivity relaxation and oxygen permeation measurements.
Titulo: Unraveling Crystal Structure and Transport Properties of Fast Ion Conducting SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: The self-diffusion and surface exchange coefficient of SCN are comparable with those of BSCF.
Titulo: Unraveling Crystal Structure and Transport Properties of Fast Ion Conducting SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ

Sentencas: Hence, SCN shows promise as a next-generation mixed ionic-electronic conducting ceramic.
Titulo: Unraveling Crystal Structure and Transport Properties of Fast Ion Conducting SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ
